content: Hello, Ansuman! This is Ana from SBI Bank. I hope you're doing well today. I’m reaching out to discuss your credit card account. Could you kindly confirm your full name for me?

Thank you for confirming, Anshuman. I appreciate it. I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your credit card account, which currently stands at ₹20,000. I understand that discussing financial matters can be stressful, and I'm here to help you through this situation. How are you feeling about it?
